name: Super Fruitball Deluxe
description:
Family game night at the Fruits' always means one thing - SUPER FRUITBALL. 

SMASH the cherry bomb into your opponent's goal before they PUT YOU IN YOUR PLACE. 2D platformer controls meet ball-smacking action in this couch co-op game for up to 4 players! 

This game requires controllers to play multiplayer. We recommend XBox Controllers. Controls: Joystick to move, A to jump, B to dash, X to kick. If using keyboard, Arrow Keys to move, Space to jump, Left Alt to dash, Left Control to kick.

This game was developed by:

    Matthew Holtzem - Design, Engineering, VFX
    Derago Duong - Illustration
    Jarom Norris - Project Management, Design, Engineering
    Jaron Frost - Illustration, Animation, VFX
    Karina Pardus - Music, Sound
